A teen-aged girl gets the horse of her dreams and is trained by an ex-Jockey to participate in London's Grand National Steeplechase. In the course of her training, the girl meets a charming aristocrat who offers to support her in her sporting ambitions. His mother, on the other hand, is against the girl and in the end the steed has a great race.

I loved October Sky. The thing I loved most had to be the music. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence through the evil schemes of the local agriculture cooperative and the ideological rule enforced by the military-backed government of those days.

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat.
